title: Avanti Linens - Fabric Shower Curtain, Botanical Inspired Bathroom Decor (Ombre Leaves Collection)
features: Embrace the green - The Ombre Leaves Shower Curtain has beautiful leaves and foliage to instantly blend and coordinate with your luxury bathroom.
The Ombre Leaves Collection has a subtle ombre color gradient that makes a perfect accent for any room.
description: The Avanti Ombre Leaves Shower Curtain features a beautifully printed botanical design in various shades of green, beige and blue on an ombred, heavyweight textured base cloth. 52% polyester, 48% cotton. Imported.
